uk.mrs.saralarm.ui.settings.deepui.rules.android:summary:
Configure as many rules as you like using a phrase, SMS number or both. If the "Both" option is selected, a received SMS containing the phrase would've had to come from "SMS Number" to trigger the alarm.
Example:
•SMS number: 07........(SARCALL Number or alternative)
•Phrase: LAKESMRT (A phrase common within the callout SMS messages)
uk.mrs.saralarm.ui.settings.deepui.rules.android:title: Trigger Rules

uk.mrs.saralarm.ui.settings.deepui.phone.android:summary: Set the SMS numbers to send the SAR A/L/N SMS to from the "Respond" Page.\nThe SAR A/L/N message can be sent to multiple numbers at the same time.
uk.mrs.saralarm.ui.settings.deepui.phone.android:title: SAR A/L/N Reply Number

uk.mrs.saralarm.ui.settings.deepui.custo.android:summary: Setup response messages to append to the SAR A/L messages. You don't need to enter the "SAR A/L" prefix, just the message itself\nFor example..."On my way to RV from my home."
uk.mrs.saralarm.ui.settings.deepui.custo.android:title: SAR A/L Predefined Response Messages
